item.title: PHP, OpenSSL and ftp_ssl_connect() on Win32
item.description: For quite some time I’ve been wanting to compile PHP for the sole purpose of using the http://us.php.net/ftp_ssl_connect function. According to the PHP manual: ftp_ssl_connect() is only available if OpenSSL support is enabled into your version of PHP. If it's undefined and you've compiled FTP support then this is why. For Windows you must compile your own PHP binaries to support this function. When I first saw this I was disappointed.
